sourcesContent: import React, { useState, useRef, useEffect } from 'react' import { Button, Form } from 'semantic-ui-react' import { useMutation } from '@apollo/react-hooks' import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom' import { POST_EDIT_MUTATION } from '../query' const PostEdit = ({ postEditData }) => { const titleRef = useRef() const contentRef = useRef() const history = useHistory() const [ postEdit, { data } ] = useMutation(POST_EDIT_MUTATION) const handleOnSubmit = () => { const id = postEditData.id const titleValue = titleRef.current.value const contentValue = contentRef.current.value postEdit({ variables: { id: id, title: titleValue, content: contentValue } }) history.push('/') } return (
